definition: just as in the past (idiom); as before/continuing as always
to forget and not bear recriminations (idiom); to let bygones be bygones/There is no point in crying over spilt milk.
not censure sb for his past misdeeds/overlook sb's past mistakes/let bygones be bygones
lit. once said, a team of horses cannot unsay it (idiom); a promise must be kept
pinyin: yi1 yan2 ji4 chu1 , si4 ma3 nan2 zhui1

definition: Since they have come, we should make them comfortable (idiom). Since we're here, take it easy./Since this is so, we should accept it./Now we have come, let's stay and take the rough with the smooth./If you can't do anything to prevent it, you might as well sit back and enjoy it.
pinyin: ji4 lai2 zhi1 , ze2 an1 zhi1

sentences.english: "I'm so glad to see you, " said Carrie, pleased and yet nonplussed.
sentences.chinese: “看見你我太高興了，”嘉莉說，既高興又爲難。

sentences.english: The line was going out fast but steadily and the fish was not panicked.
sentences.chinese: 釣索朝水中溜得既快又穩，闡明這魚並不受驚。

sentences.english: Having been dehumanized in turn, they will embrace inhumanity and brutality.
sentences.chinese: 既已被非人化，他們將擁抱非人性和殘暴。

sentences.english: Also nobody proof, the child does not recognize the father, the county magistrate worried for a while.
sentences.chinese: 既沒有人證明，孩子也不認爹，縣官一時犯了難。

sentences.english: My acquaintance confirmed that his fellow postmen were neither terribly nice nor terribly nasty.
sentences.chinese: 我這位熟人證明，他的同事們既不太好，也不太差。

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行爲未達既遂是由於單位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: Men of this sort, “abusers of power”, both fascinated and repelled her.
sentences.chinese: 她對這類“濫權者”，既着迷又憎惡。

sentences.english: There were no entrances or exits, and players could only leave by hearthing out;
sentences.chinese: 既沒有入口也沒有出口，玩家只能爐石出去。

sentences.english: In joint offense has transitional form of crimes, also exists surplus behavior.
sentences.chinese: 共同犯罪中既存在轉化犯，也存在過限問題。

sentences.english: Pendants are also favorites because they're both functional and decorative.
sentences.chinese: 我也很喜歡墜飾吊燈，因爲它們既實用又好看。

sentences.english: Do you think the news media in Hong Kong have any scruple about criticizing the XX Government?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得香港新聞傳媒系批評XX政府既時候有冇顧忌？

sentences.english: The hall was built on a high terrace, and has 21 rooms.
sentences.chinese: 大廳既建立在一個高的平臺，並有21間。

sentences.english: My childhood was not one of hunger and cold .
sentences.chinese: 我的童年既不捱餓也不受凍。

sentences.english: The feet are well-arched, compact, and turn neither in nor out.
sentences.chinese: 足爪呈拱形，緊湊，既不向內也不向外翻。

sentences.english: Stronger is useless, why not Lele eyes?
sentences.chinese: 要強既是沒用，何不樂樂眼前呢？

sentences.english: There are plants which have neither roots nor leaves.
sentences.chinese: 有些植物既無根又無葉。

definition: (once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
